Text: Do not download, never trust a pure exe file, i acctualy did try, and it just would not install bandicam for me. sounds like a virus to me.. :/
Don't trust this, I'm lucky I have Norton, because it had to remove the file because it could harm my computer

bandicam works only first time 2 time it's say install application again
any solution on this?
First of all, Bandicam eventually will detect the it's not original, so it will block itself requesting you to reinstall Bandicam. This is the reason why I made the unattended installer.
I already said most AV detect it as virus, but in fact it detects the keymaker compressed inside.
If you know something about programming, I made the installer and this is the source code: pastebindotcomslash SG33KTDG
As you can see, there is no suspicious activities. The installer is the original one downloaded from Bandicam website, and the keymaker is the one from the link in the description.
